title: Flying Dragon
summaries: The Flying Dragon is a Hardmode, post-Golem projectile sword that fires bright red, crescent-shaped Hearty Slash projectiles once per swing, which travels through solid blocks and produces light. The Hearty Slash projectiles can pierce up to four enemies and dissipate after hitting a fifth. The Flying Dragon has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by Betsy during Tier 3 of the Old One's Army event.

statistics.Sell: 5 GC
